q1.text: Welcome to the Home Page! How can I assist you?

options.label: Exit
options.answer: Thank you for visiting! Have a great day!

q2.text: We offer a variety of services. Which one are you interested in?

options.label: Service A
options.answer: Service A is our premium offering.

options.label: Service B
options.answer: Service B is tailored for small businesses.

q3.text: Our support team will get back to you soon!
